name: Mathematics for Teachers
description: The course discusses the Mathematics curriculum (K-12) from the following aspects: the strands of the curriculum and their place in the world of Mathematics, the nature of the proofs, applications of Mathematics, and the connection of Mathematics to other subjects. Restricted to students in the CSC/MAT/STA major and specialist programs. [36L, 12T]
prerequisites: Minimum 60% in MAT134Y5/MAT135Y5/MAT137Y5/MAT157Y5/MAT233H5, minimum 60% in MAT102H5, MAT223H5/MAT240H5, and at least one additional MAT half-course at the 200+ level.
